titleStmt.title: Five essays in political arithmetick ... by Sir William Petty ...
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

titleStmt.title: Five essays in political arithmetick ... by Sir William Petty ...
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

notesStmt.note: Parallel text in English and French; opposite pages bear duplicate numbering.
Title on added t.p.: Cinq essays sur l'arithmetique politique.
Reproduction of original in Columbia University Library.

(from t.p.) I. Objections from the city of Rey in Persia and from Monsr. Auzout against two former essays, answered -- II. A comparison between London and Paris in 14 particulars -- III. Proofs that at London ... there live about 696 thousand people -- IV. An estimate of the people in London, Paris, Amsterdam, Venice, Rome, Dublin, Bristoll and Rouen, with several observations upon the same -- V. Concerning Holland and the rest of the VII United Provinces.
